passives.name: Skipper
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-hit against any enemy grant a stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. At maximum stacks, or 4 stacks, your next basic attack against a champion, epic monster, or structure consumes all stacks to deal {{rd|120%|84%}} base AD ad (+ {{rd|5%|3.5%}} maximum health) bonus physical damage, increased to {{rd|300%|210%}} base AD ad (+ {{rd|10%|7%}} maximum health) against structures.

passives.name: Boarding Party
passives.effects: Allied {{ui|Blue Siege Minion|link=Siege minion|siege minions}} and {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link=Super minion|super minions}} within icononly=true 1050 units gain {{rd|70 to 130 for 11|70*0.5 to 130*0.5 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, as well as 10% increased size.
